title: When was the last time you got in trouble with the police? - Quora
tags: Legal Issues and Law in Everyday Life

response.answer_text: A Year ago someone pulled in front of me and totalled my antique car.. Igot a no license and a no insurance ticket. B4 that i got a dwi assault and felony malicious mischief that got dropped to open container.

I was on a business trip in Russia and they do regular searches and during this they ask for your ID my passport was kept safe at the hotel so I had no ID the officer said she had the right to arrest me and take me back to the station I was released a couple hours after and the police apologised for the inconvenience.
